thread.title: Fella
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Fella

author: Fella
title: Fella
text:
Rhoda is very knowledgeable and I have ever privilege knowing her. I was so uneasy and uncomfortable with the situation but Rhoda explained all my optionand put me at ease. She walked me through all the choices available for me and guided me through the best option for me. My mind is now at ease and can't wait to be debt free.
Thanks to Rhoda and the proposal department.
